All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
 
AppTest
Unit test for simple App.
Card
The Card class represents a playing card in the game of Blackjack.
GameController
This class is responsible for controlling the flow of the Blackjack game, handling user registration, login, game actions, and database interactions.
LoginView
The LoginView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the login screen in the Blackjack game.
MainView
 
MongoDBManager
MongoDBManager handles the database interactions for the Blackjack game, including user authentication, saving scores, and managing card collections.
RegisterView
The RegisterView class represents the graphical user interface (GUI) for the registration screen.
